name: geofs-autoland
description: Adding new functionalities to the GeoFS Flight Simulator.
author: Nicolas Rodriguez, Guy Adler

scripts.build: npm i && node build.js && npx jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && npx prettier --write . && npx eslint . --fix --debug
scripts.test: npx prettier --check . && npx eslint . --debug && npx audit-ci --info && npm outdated
